name: doodleJumper
description:
This is a doodle jump clone, in a minimalist style.

You are an orange cube and the objective of the game is to avoid falling to the bottom of the screen.

Lime green and light blue platforms are cool, they allow you to jump and sometimes double jump.

Grey platforms are evil (they allow you to move, but not to jump) so avoid them at all costs.

Controls

Jump: Spacebar / Left Mouse Button

Move: Left and Right Arrows / A and D
